mapper.insert: insert into TBL_NONMEMBER ( non_name, non_tel, non_car_id, non_rental_date, non_return_date, non_license_num, non_license_type,non_license_birth) values (#{non_name}, #{non_tel},#{non_car_id}, str_to_date(#{non_rental_date}, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i'), str_to_date(#{non_return_date}, '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i'), #{non_license_num}, #{non_license_type}, #{non_license_birth} )
